Constructor Detail

ImageManager.Builder

public ImageManager.Builder(android.content.Context context)
Create a new builder. No options are required. By default will create an lru memory cache, an lru disk cache, and will recycle bitmaps if the device sdk version allows it.

Parameters:
context - Any context (will not be retained after build)
Method Detail

build

public ImageManager build()
Builds an ImageManager. Any defaults that haven't been set will be set

Returns:
A new ImageManager

setResizeService

public ImageManager.Builder setResizeService(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService resizeService)
Sets the service that will be used to load and resize images not yet in the disk cache. Defaults to a fixed thread pool with the number of threads equal to the number of available processors where every thread is run at min priority.

Parameters:
resizeService - The executor service to use to resize images
Returns:
This Builder

setBitmapCompressFormat

public ImageManager.Builder setBitmapCompressFormat(android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat bitmapCompressFormat)
Sets the format that will be used to write all bitmaps to disk in the disk cache (if one is present). By default bitmaps without transparency are written as JPEGs for the fastest possible decodes and bitmaps with transparency are written as PNGs to maximize quality. This will override the format used for all bitmaps, regardless of whether or not they contain transparency.

Parameters:
bitmapCompressFormat - The format to pass to Bitmap.compress(android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat, int, java.io.OutputStream) when saving to the disk cache
Returns:
This Builder
See Also:
Bitmap.compress(android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat, int, java.io.OutputStream)

setBitmapCompressQuality

public ImageManager.Builder setBitmapCompressQuality(int quality)
Set the compression quality for Bitmaps when writing them out to the disk cache.

Parameters:
quality - Hint for compression in range 0-100 with 0 being lowest and 100 being highest quality. Will only be applied for certain lossy compression formats
Returns:
This Builder
See Also:
Bitmap.compress(android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat, int, java.io.OutputStream), This will only apply to bitmaps saved to the disk cache as JPEGs (bitmaps with the RGB_565 config)

setBitmapPool

public ImageManager.Builder setBitmapPool(BitmapPool bitmapPool)
Set the implementation of a BitmapPool to use to store and retrieve recycled bitmaps based on their width and height. Should be thread safe and size limited in some way to avoid OOM exceptions.

Parameters:
bitmapPool - The BitmapPool implementation to use
Returns:
This Builder
